entry.title: Time in a Bottle
entry.summary:
Author: 88Cookie88

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,691Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 28

Summary: Clark Kent feels stuck.He’s been teaching at Gotham Private as an English literature teacher for five years now: the students love him; he gets on well with the other staff; and most importantly, he loves his job.Yet he feels stuck – it’s as if time has stopped. It’s been this way ever since Lois left, leaving behind an ache that never quite fully healed.Though this all changes one seemingly ordinary night, when Clark catches sight of a man in a moonlit corridor. It is in this suspended moment, when this stranger’s eyes meet his, that Clark’s world makes an unprecedented shift.It is then that time begins to move again – when Clark Kent meets Bruce Wayne.[This work will be updated regularly until completion]

entry.title: Just a little time
entry.summary:
Author: kitsu_kitkat

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,479Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 7

Summary: The sound of ceramic smashing against the floor came after he had turned, and he barely cared for the ruined Superman memorabilia mug when he was graced with the sight of Bruce.  Sun-warmed, sleep-sweet Bruce, his blushing skin drained of colour and with blood running down his lips and a wide eyed stare.  Neither of them could say anything before the world came crashing down. Or maybe that was just Bruce. Or maybe it didn't matter, because Bruce was his world. And Bruce was gone.Aka, Clark goes back in time to save his lover from dying. Too bad they didn't specific which way, or when. But hey, at least he has the help of himself. That has to count for something, right? For Superbat Week 2025Day 1: How to win the time warTime Loops | Time Travel | De aging

entry.title: What If I Had An Image Problem And You Had An Image Problem And Our Joint Solution Was The Stupidest One Imaginable (And We Were Both Boys)
entry.summary:
Author: goddcoward

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,913Chapters: 1/5Kudos: 41

Summary: “Let me see if I’ve got this right,” Bruce says slowly. “You want me to speak with a reporter, on record, in my civilian identity, and claim that I’ve had sex with you. You then want me to divulge the details of this nonexistent sexual encounter in a way that will convince the woman you are infatuated with that Kryptonians are, in fact, intimately compatible with human beings, contrary to what you in your civilian identity have previously implied to her.” It does sound a lot worse when B is repeating it back to him in that unnecessarily judgmental tone of voice. “Well. Yes, basically.” “Kal. You want Bruce Wayne to inform the press that he’s fucked Superman.” “Or been fucked by Superman! Or both. Both would be best, actually. To confirm that I can do both.” Bruce stares at him.Clark has an issue. Bruce has a separate, tangentially-related issue. Surely this won’t become a problem for the World’s Finest.

entry.summary:
Author: Skylarium_Rose

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,712Chapters: 1/4Kudos: 14

Summary: When a magic spell turns his boys into their younger selves, Bruce is faced with his hardest challenge yet; a single parent with multiple kids under 10. But the Robin clutch of mayhem is easier to weather when Clark offers his amazing babysitter skills. Now if only Bruce could ignore his growing feelings better as he watches Clark succeed and fumble right beside him. And that’s not including the Batfamily plan for them either.

entry.title: Rodeo
entry.summary:
Author: rohien

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,595Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 23

Summary: Bruce and Clark go to the rodeo. He had gotten these tickets as a surprise for Clark’s birthday. Clark doesn’t look his true age, to Bruce’s displeasure. If he had to guess, Bruce would say it was because of a combination of insane Kryptonian genetics and the superpowered artificial suns Bruce installed in the Batcave. With both of them approaching the big four-oh but only Bruce looking like it, it’s safe to say he is regretting that decision. (Not really. Installing a few million-dollar artificial suns in the Batcave had been nothing. Looking a few years older than his partner was a tradeoff he was more than willing to make; Bruce would sacrifice his own life ten times over if it meant Clark would get a minute more to live. To see the sun.)

entry.title: Please Notice Me, Mr. Wayne!
entry.summary:
Author: alohamoron

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 23,721Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 245

Summary: Clark Kent is a clumsy journalist with a big problem. He has been obsessed with Gotham’s billionaire Bruce Wayne for months, and that obsession is slowly turning into something more like genuine romantic admiration. Determined to get closer, he hatches a plan to have Batman deliver his messages to Bruce Wayne without ever saying a word himself. Of course, nothing goes as planned. Signals get hilariously crossed, schemes backfire, and Clark ends up tangled up in more chaos with Batman while still obsessing over Bruce. He has no idea that Bruce and Batman are actually the same man.
